TEXT: The applicant is a NORP national , born in DATE and living in GPE , GPE . She is represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON

DATE ) , the applicant was subjected to repeated and systematic rape and sexual abuse by her step - father , who lived with the applicant , her mother and brother . The applicant was too frightened to report the matter , but eventually her brother , who was also abused by their step - father , informed the police on DATE . The step - father was convicted in ORG in DATE of rape and lewd and libidinous practices . He was sentenced to DATE imprisonment in respect of his offences against the applicant , and a further CARDINAL years’ in respect of those against the applicant ’s brother .

The abuse has had a highly detrimental effect on the applicant . She has attempted suicide on CARDINAL occasions and suffered depression and relationship problems which have led to QUANTITY divorces .

On DATE the applicant lodged an application for criminal injuries compensation with ORG ( “ ORG ” ) . On DATE the ORG wrote to the applicant explaining that her application had been refused under paragraph CARDINAL(b ) of ORG , which expressly excludes the payment of compensation where the criminal injury was received before DATE and the victim and assailant were living together at the time as members of the same family .
The applicant lodged a review against this decision which was refused by the ORG on DATE . She then lodged an appeal to ORG . The appeal was refused on DATE .
